discourse_list.title: Token curated blacklist of scam addresses

content.content: I wonder whether anyone discussed or proposed token curated lists as a decentralized governance of blacklists of scammer addresses.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking for feedback on the idea of using token curated lists for decentralized governance of blacklists of scammer addresses. The post does not explain the proposal in detail, but rather poses a question and seeks input from others.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: There’s at least one project I know that’s working on this: YourJustice.life and probably others as well
